seo.title: Order Moonochew - Cattle-Resistant Tree Guards
seo.description: Order your Moonochew tree guards. $250 AUD per unit. Australian made, infinitely reusable, cattle-proof protection for your trees.

hero.headline: Order
hero.subheadline: Generations of fresh food. Priceless protection. One investment.

product.name: Moonochew Sapling Protector
product.tagline: World's only cattle-resistant, barbed stainless spring steel tree guard
product.mainImageAlt: Moonochew tree guard - barbed stainless spring steel construction

orderForm.headline: Place Your Order

bulkOrders.headline: Planning a
bulkOrders.subheadline: For bulk orders, rental arrangements, or fee-for-service models, get in touch. Moonochew's durability makes it ideal for sharing economy models and large-scale regeneration projects.

items.title: Cattle-Proof
items.description: The only tree guard livestock consistently leave well alone. 12+ years of testing with various breeds.

items.title: Infinitely Reusable
items.description: Stainless spring steel lasts for generations. Protect hundreds of trees with a single guard.

items.title: 10-Minute Setup
items.description: No tools required. Pre-folded design simply wraps around tree and pegs into ground.
